reg_info.act_under: Ontario Water Resources Act   Loi sur les ressources en eau de l’Ontario

content.content: 1. In this Regulation, “Lake Simcoe Basin” means Lake Simcoe and the part of Ontario from which surface water drains into Lake Simcoe; “sewage treatment plant” means a sewage works for which an approval is required under section 53 of the Act and that, (a) treats sewage from one or more buildings within the meaning of the Building Code Act, 1992, and (b) disposes of the treated sewage in a surface water body in the Lake Simcoe Basin. O. Reg. 60/08, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. In this Regulation,

“Lake Simcoe Basin” means Lake Simcoe and the part of Ontario from which surface water drains into Lake Simcoe;

“sewage treatment plant” means a sewage works for which an approval is required under section 53 of the Act and that,

(a) treats sewage from one or more buildings within the meaning of the Building Code Act, 1992, and

(b) disposes of the treated sewage in a surface water body in the Lake Simcoe Basin. O. Reg. 60/08, s. 1.

content.content: 4. (1) Each owner of a sewage treatment plant listed in Column 2 of Table 1 shall calculate the average amount of total phosphorus discharged from the plant for each month during each of the following periods: 1. April 1, 2008 to March 31, 2009. 2. April 1, 2009 to March 31, 2010. O. Reg. 130/09, s. 3 (1). (2) In calculating the average amount of total phosphorus under subsection (1), the owner shall, in a manner specified by the Director appointed in respect of subsection 53 (3) of the Act, base the calculation on the sampling and testing results obtained in accordance with the approval issued for the sewage treatment plant under section 53 of the Act. O. Reg. 130/09, s. 3 (2). (3) Subsection (1) does not apply to a sewage treatment plant in respect of a month if the plant does not discharge treated sewage to a surface water body during that month. O. Reg. 60/08, s. 4 (3). (4) Each owner shall record the amount calculated under subsection (1) and make it available to a provincial officer upon request. O. Reg. 60/08, s. 4 (4).
content.raw_html:
4. (1) Each owner of a sewage treatment plant listed in Column 2 of Table 1 shall calculate the average amount of total phosphorus discharged from the plant for each month during each of the following periods:

1. April 1, 2008 to March 31, 2009.

2. April 1, 2009 to March 31, 2010. O. Reg. 130/09, s. 3 (1).

(2) In calculating the average amount of total phosphorus under subsection (1), the owner shall, in a manner specified by the Director appointed in respect of subsection 53 (3) of the Act, base the calculation on the sampling and testing results obtained in accordance with the approval issued for the sewage treatment plant under section 53 of the Act. O. Reg. 130/09, s. 3 (2).

(3) Subsection (1) does not apply to a sewage treatment plant in respect of a month if the plant does not discharge treated sewage to a surface water body during that month. O. Reg. 60/08, s. 4 (3).

(4) Each owner shall record the amount calculated under subsection (1) and make it available to a provincial officer upon request. O. Reg. 60/08, s. 4 (4).

content.content: 5. (1) Each owner of a sewage treatment plant listed in Column 2 of Table 1 shall submit a report to the Director appointed in respect of subsection 53 (3) of the Act, (a) on or before June 30, 2009, setting out the information mentioned in subsection (1.1) with respect to the period from April 1, 2008 to March 31, 2009; and (b) on or before June 30, 2010, setting out the information mentioned in subsection (1.1) with respect to the period from April 1, 2009 to March 31, 2010. O. Reg. 130/09, s. 4 (1). (1.1) A report mentioned in subsection (1) shall set out, with respect to the period, (a) the amount of total phosphorus discharged from the plant during each month; and (b) the total amount of total phosphorus discharged from the plant. O. Reg. 130/09, s. 4 (1). (2) A report referred to in subsection (1) shall be submitted in the form and manner approved by the Director and shall contain any additional information, as specified by the Director in writing, that relates to the discharge of total phosphorus from the sewage treatment plant during that period. O. Reg. 60/08, s. 5 (2); O. Reg. 130/09, s. 4 (2).
content.raw_html:
5. (1) Each owner of a sewage treatment plant listed in Column 2 of Table 1 shall submit a report to the Director appointed in respect of subsection 53 (3) of the Act,

(a) on or before June 30, 2009, setting out the information mentioned in subsection (1.1) with respect to the period from April 1, 2008 to March 31, 2009; and

(b) on or before June 30, 2010, setting out the information mentioned in subsection (1.1) with respect to the period from April 1, 2009 to March 31, 2010. O. Reg. 130/09, s. 4 (1).

(1.1) A report mentioned in subsection (1) shall set out, with respect to the period,

(a) the amount of total phosphorus discharged from the plant during each month; and

(b) the total amount of total phosphorus discharged from the plant. O. Reg. 130/09, s. 4 (1).

(2) A report referred to in subsection (1) shall be submitted in the form and manner approved by the Director and shall contain any additional information, as specified by the Director in writing, that relates to the discharge of total phosphorus from the sewage treatment plant during that period. O. Reg. 60/08, s. 5 (2); O. Reg. 130/09, s. 4 (2).

content.content: 8. For greater certainty, subject to subsection 107 (5) of the Act, the requirements of this Regulation are in addition to and independent of requirements in an approval, order, direction or other instrument issued under any Act. O. Reg. 60/08, s. 8.
content.raw_html: 8. For greater certainty, subject to subsection 107 (5) of the Act, the requirements of this Regulation are in addition to and independent of requirements in an approval, order, direction or other instrument issued under any Act. O. Reg. 60/08, s. 8.
